summary: THE INSTRUMENT PANEL LIGHTS ON THE VEHICLE HAS DECREASED IN BRIGHTNESS.  THE PROBLEM IS NOTICEABLE AT NIGHT.  THERE IS A RESISTANCE WHEN TURNING THE WHEEL AND WHEN BACKING.  THE RUBBER GASKETS CONTINUE TO FALL FROM THE SLIDING PASSENGER DOOR ON THE DRIVERS SIDE.  THE VEHICLE HAS TAKEN A LONG TIME TO WARM UP IN COLD WEATHER.  THE ALTERNATOR WAS REPLACED.  SCC
